channel.title: [562]Palindino's Server+Client Help needed
channel.description: Basically wondering if anyone can point me to some tuts. I am switching from 317 to 562 and know little to nothing about how it works. I noticed the saved chara files are in .DAT format so if anyone has a free download that is good and lets you view .DAT files (Not the RS DATmaker) that would be helpful. And in general some basic tutorials on how to set up a 562 server. Any help is greatly appreciated and if it is useful information I will gladly give rep ++

item.title: [562]Palindino's Server+Client Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Trees Trees
item.description:
@Trees wrote:

I would be glad to help you with your 562, your
player saves are .dats so I’m assuming your running paladino76. I suggest switching to RS2HD, I will be releasing one of mine soon. Feel free to ask some questions and I’ll be sure to answer.

Read full topic
